Shockwave/Vehement/Reflector:




Shockwave slowly decellerated as two unidentified energy-signatures were 
detected by his computer, and they were still out visual range, but that 
wouldn't be so for long.

The Neo Decepticon armed his laser weaponry and energy-signature seeking 
missiles, still moving and awaiting to meet these intruders head on.  He 
deactivated the missiles though, when he saw it was two Brotherhood members.
"What do you want?" Shockwave snapped, stopping almost immediately and 
converting into his biped mode.

"We are to escort you to our base on Rapa Nui.  It is there your comrades 
are." Vehement replied, pointing in the direction of the triangle-shaped 
island he was speakin of.

"My comrades?" he intoned with curiousity.

"Were killed, supposedly, by the Alliance.  You will come with us." Reflector 
said, the two Brotherhood members heading at top speed for Rapa Nui, 
Shockwave in close pursuit, still confused.
